Simulates two level nested data

Source: R/data_reg.r
data_reg_nested.Rd

Takes simulation parameter arguments and returns simulated data.

data_reg_nested(Xmat, Zmat, beta, rand_eff, n, p, err)

Arguments

Xmat

A matrix of covariates.
Zmat

Design matrix for random effects.
beta

A vector of regression parameters.
rand_eff

A vector of random effects, must be stacked.
n

Number of clusters.
p

Number of units within each cluster.
err

A vector of within cluster errors.
